post.desc:
So this is how Zanmu became a grey eminence of Hell ‚Äì her hair was charmingly shorter back then... ü§î What really is her position in the political landscape over there though? While the kishin aren't formally under her beck and call, she is greatly respected and could get them to not march to the surface for the recent incident.

Perhaps it may be the case that Zanmu's influence over Hell is about equal to Hecatia's. The Japanese half-oni has the ears of practically every oni in Hell and beyond. And the Anatolian triple god presumably has a monopoly in faith throughout the Hell.

Or Hells? ü§® Was the Former Hell all hells, or was just Earth's old Hell?
